description:
The princess of the monster country, Ygvarland, Astarotte is a succubus which requires sucking the "life-seed" from men to stay alive. She has just reached the age where she must create a harem to live, but Lotte hates men more than anything. Lotte gives the loud-mouthed head lady-in-waiting, Judit, the near impossible task of bringing her a human male. But Judit manages to open the World Tree`s
gate and travel to the Realm of Man. Who will she meet there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出会いのエクスクラメーション
